metadata.name: HackTool - GMER Rootkit Detector and Remover Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution GMER tool based on image and hash fields.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\gmer.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=e9dc058440d321aa17d0600b3ca0ab04')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=539c228b6b332f5aa523e5ce358c16647d8bbe57')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=e8a3e804a96c716a3e9b69195db6ffb0d33e2433af871e4d4e1eab3097237173'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution GMER tool based on image and hash fields.
